member.name: T:Jwc.Experiment.Xunit.TestAttribute
member.summary: 이 attribute는 method위에 선언되어 해당 method가 test라는 것을 지칭하게 되며, non-parameterized test 뿐 아니라 parameterized test에도 사용될 수 있다.

member.name: M:Jwc.Experiment.Xunit.TestAttribute.EnumerateTestCommands(Xunit.Sdk.IMethodInfo)
member.summary: Enumerates the test commands represented by this test method. Derived classes should override this method to return instances of , one per execution of a test method.
member.returns: The test commands which will execute the test runs for the given method.

member.summary: Creates an instance of .

member.name: P:Jwc.Experiment.Xunit.ExceptionCommand.Exception
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the exception.

member.name: T:Jwc.Experiment.Xunit.FirstClassCommand
member.summary: Represents a test command for first class tests.

member.name: M:Jwc.Experiment.Xunit.FirstClassCommand.#ctor(Xunit.Sdk.IMethodInfo,System.String,System.Action)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The test method which this instance is associated. This will likely be the method adorned with an .
A string to show parameters of a test method in test result.
The test action to be invoked when the test is executed.

member.summary: Execute the test action.

member.summary: Gets the test method.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating the string to show parameters of a test method in test result.

member.summary: Gets the test action.

member.name: P:Jwc.Experiment.Xunit.FirstClassCommand.ShouldCreateInstance
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a test-case instance is created.
member.value: true if a test-case instance is created; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Jwc.Experiment.Xunit.FirstClassTestAttribute
member.summary: A test attribute used to adorn methods that creates first-class executable test cases.

member.returns: The test commands which will execute the test runs for the given method.

member.summary: Gets the display name of the test method.

member.summary: Determines if the test runner infrastructure should create a new instance of the test class before running the test.

member.name: P:Jwc.Experiment.Xunit.ExceptionUnwrappingCommand.Timeout
member.summary: Determines if the test should be limited to running a specific amount of time before automatically failing.
member.returns: The timeout value, in milliseconds; if zero, the test will not have a timeout.
